title: PS5 restock: GameStop finally made it easy to buy PS5 this week
author: matt-swider
summary: We will tell you when and where to buy PS5 – nearly 45,000 people helped so far
article: Update: The GameStop PS5 restock today represented a turning point.

It was easier to buy a PS5 bundle from GameStop in an online sale that was initially said to be limited to its PowerUp Po members (other people got it eventually). In a sign that demand for the Sony console is being met to some degree, Walmart and Sony Direct had large restocks – and Sam's Club dropped PS5 Disc (leaving Walmart with PS5 Digital.
Where will PS5 restock next? We think Best Buy on Monday. When? Glad you asked.

We know Best Buy is preparing for a PS5 restock soon (it has added a new bundle in the last week and has teased the add-to-cart button), but we're not confident it'll be today based on the updated information from our sources. There was no inventory at Best Buy warehouses as of yesterday, but when that has happened before, it usually means a restock will happen early the next week.
Instead, the GameStop PS5 restock went live today and was meant for PowerUp Pro members at 11:30am EDT / 10:30am CDT / 9:30am MDT / 8:30am PDT.
We'll continue to report on the PS5 restock news next week because, as you can tell, there was no Best Buy restock and we have a strong feeling it'll be on Monday.

headers.3: PS5 restock news for June 18: GameStop, not Best Buy
